setting.aesthetic_directive: dark, moody, oil painting, cinematic lighting, medieval castle battlements at night
setting.initial_description: Elsinore. A platform before the castle. It is late at night, the air biting cold, and a thick fog clings to the stone battlements. A lone guard, Francisco, is at his post.

events.line: Nay, answer me. Stand and unfold yourself.
You come most carefully upon your hour.
'Tis now struck twelve. Get thee to bed, Francisco.
For this relief much thanks. 'Tis bitter cold, And I am sick at heart.

events.description: The bells chime midnight as Francisco leaves, and Barnardo stands alone on the misty platform, peering into the oppressive darkness.
Act I, Scene 1 concludes. You may start a new adventure or use #setgm to continue the story in a new mode.
